revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=E-TOP |model=BR080n |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/12/2010 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U6A-BR080N |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=portable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} The FCC test report lists the following as identical models.. *E-TOP BR080n, BR081n *Amigo BR080n, BR081n *CNet CQR-980, [[CNet CQR-981|CQR-981]], CQR-982, CQR-983, CQR-984, CQR-985, CQR-986, CQR-989 *SAPIDO RB-1602, RB-1632
"EPMBBR081NXXX2XX" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC manual lists the default IP (in router mode) as 192.168.1.1 and the default credentials as admin:admin.
==Images== <gallery caption="internals from a CNet CQR-980"> File:CNet CQR-980 board top.jpg|board top File:CNet CQR-980 RTL8196C.jpg|RTL8196C File:CNet CQR-980 RTL8188RE side.jpg|RTL8188RE side File:CNet CQR-980 RAM.jpg|RAM File:CNet CQR-980 board ID.jpg|board ID File:CNet CQR-980 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:CNet CQR-980 Flash.jpg|Flash </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
